text: Anna Helene Paquin (born 24 July 1982) is a Canadian-New Zealand movie actress. She was born in Winnipeg, Manitoba to a French Canadian father and New Zealand mother. She won Academy Awards for The Piano at age 11 in 1994. She also performed in movies related to the X-Men franchise. Paquin is openly bisexual.Why I came out as bisexual == Filmography == === Films === Year Title Role Notes 1993 The Piano Flora McGrath 1996 Jane Eyre Young Jane Eyre Fly Away Home Amy Alden 1997
